snippet: With 12 new events prompting an 18th day of competition, the network’s coverage will start the day before the opening ceremony, on Feb. 6, at Sochi, Russia.
abstract: NBC announces that it will begin its prime-time broadcast of 2014 Olympics day before opening ceremony, on Feb 16.
lead_paragraph: With 12 new events prompting an 18th day of competition, the network’s coverage will start the day before the opening ceremony, on Feb. 6, at Sochi, Russia.

headline.seo: NBC’s 2014 Olympic Broadcasts to Begin a Day Early
headline.main: NBC’s Broadcasts of 2014 Winter Games Will Begin a Day Early
